info.title: Supabase API (Experimental)
info.description: This is our experimental API and the endpoint definitions can change at any time.

count.description: Total number of projects. Use this to calculate the total number of pages.

limit.description: Maximum number of projects per page (actual number may be less)

offset.description: Number of projects skipped in this response

db_region.description: Provider region description. Only one of db_region or region_selection can be specified.

release_channel.description: Release channel. If not provided, GA will be used.

postgres_engine.description: Postgres engine version. If not provided, the latest version will be used.

code.description: The Smart Region Group's code. The codes supported are not a stable API, and should be retrieved from the /available-regions endpoint.

region_selection.description: Provider region selection. Only one of db_region or region_selection can be specified.

min_increment_gb.description: Minimum increment size for disk autoscaling in GB

max_size_gb.description: Maximum limit the disk size will grow to in GB

min_increment_gb.description: Minimum increment size for disk autoscaling in GB

max_size_gb.description: Maximum limit the disk size will grow to in GB

release_channel.description: Release channel version. If not provided, GeneralAvailability will be used.

postgres_engine.description: Postgres engine version. If not provided, the latest version from the given release channel will be used.

pool_mode.description: Cannot be changed, this is ignored

db_pool.description: If `null`, the value is automatically configured based on compute size.

pool_mode.description: Dedicated pooler mode for the project

private_only.description: Whether to only allow private channels

connection_pool.description: Sets connection pool size for Realtime Authorization

max_concurrent_users.description: Sets maximum number of concurrent users rate limit

max_events_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of events per second rate per channel limit

max_bytes_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of bytes per second rate per channel limit

max_channels_per_client.description: Sets maximum number of channels per client rate limit

max_joins_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of joins per second rate limit

private_only.description: Whether to only allow private channels

connection_pool.description: Sets connection pool size for Realtime Authorization

max_concurrent_users.description: Sets maximum number of concurrent users rate limit

max_events_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of events per second rate per channel limit

max_bytes_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of bytes per second rate per channel limit

max_channels_per_client.description: Sets maximum number of channels per client rate limit

max_joins_per_second.description: Sets maximum number of joins per second rate limit
